name: Reality Clicker
description:
Are you tired of real life, government forcing you into quarantine and doing absolutely nothing at all. Well , I am too, and that's why should dump real life and play this clicker game, which simulates reality.

Features:

  • Earn ridiculous amounts of money
  • Save your progress seamlessly
  • Get experience of all sort businesses, that are ran to exploit your daily life
  • Enjoy public domain music

Become part of the revolution. Maybe you will get some ideas to exploit human resources using your money by playing this game.
